2C-1.name: 2C 1
description: 2C 1 refers to the first year of Centhris during and following the Second Convergence, an event which lasted roughly 12 years. The following major historical events took place in 2C 1:

Arrival of the Eladrin: In 2C 1, the first Eladrin stepped foot on Centhris from the realms of the Feywild.

2C-12.name: 2C 12
description: The following major historical events took place in 2C 12:

Convergence Ends: In 2C 12, the Second Convergence comes to a close with the Feywild returning to its natural existence as a mirror plane of the material world.

2C-837.name: 2C 837
description: The following major historical events took place in 2C 837:

Heskur: Sorceror-King ErÃ¨din esk Zarlaya, Grand Magister of the Utharian Empire, enters the Aelsonthar and ascends to godhood as the Stygian.
The Ruination of Centhris begins, causing the complete destruction of the Utharian Empire and widespread devastation across the entire globe.

2C-2481.name: 2C 2481
description: The following major historical events took place in 2C 2481:

Jeden: The War of Red Claws, or @>the First War of Zurastian Aggression<@, begins with the Zurastian demand of the formal annexation of the Lepkar Peninsula from Lemuria.
Dusvar: The War of Red Claws ends with Treaty of Lepkar. Zurast formally declares itself an Archduchy.

2C-2551.name: 2C 2551
description: The following major historical events took place in 2C 2551:

Singor: The War of Sellswords begins between the Archduchy Zurast and the Kingdom of Lemuria.

2C-2554.name: 2C 2554
description: The following major historical events took place in 2C 2554:

Nylwis: The War of Sellswords ends with the Archduchy of Zurast annexing territory from the Kingdom of Lemuria.
